quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: China Beststudy Education Group is an investment holding company principally engaged in the provision of educational services. The Company is primarily engaged in providing extracurricular education services from kindergarten to twelve grade (K-12), including full time revision business, talent education, self-study program, vocational education and after-school tutoring program for high school students. Full-time revision business aims to help students to be admitted to their preferred schools through Zhongkao and Gaokao. Talent education is designed to promote the all-round development of our students. Self-study program aims to improve studentsâ€™ soft power of learning. Vocational education is designed to cultivate talent with new vocational skills needed by the country and society. After-school tutoring program targets to help students establish a sound learning mindset and knowledge system and develop good learning habits. The Company's main brand is Zhuoyue Education.
